sentences: Rachel Farley (born March 28, 1995 in Lawrenceville, Georgia, United States)  is an American country music singer.
She also sang background vocals on Gilbert's 2012 single "Kick It in the Sticks".
She signed with Red Bow, a partnership of Broken Bow Records and RED Distribution, in 2012.
Red Bow released her debut single, "Ain't Easy", in early 2013.
It was followed by "Midnight Road" later in 2013, which failed to chart, and Farley subsequently parted ways with Red Bow.
